record.field: SELECT Id, Name, Supplier_Category__c, Supplier_Status__c, Account_Level__c, LastModifiedDate, BillingCountry, BillingState, BillingAddress, BillingStreet, Phone, Fax, Area_of_expertise__c, Sharepoint_Folder__c, Sharepoint_ID__c, Supplier_Description__c, Key_Information__c, Project_Assistant__c, Supplier_Selection_Form_completed__c, Website, Create_Sharepoint_Folder__c, OwnerId, Is_supplier__c, VCLS_Main_Contact__c, Supplier__c, Type, Project_Controller__c, VCLS_Alt_Name__c, Supplier_Project__c, Activity__c, Product_Type__c, Industry, KimbleOne__InvoicingCurrencyIsoCode__c, Invoice_Administrator__c FROM Account WHERE ((Supplier__c = True or Is_supplier__c = True) or (Project_Controller__c != null and VCLS_Alt_Name__c != null))

SELECT C.Id, C.Name, C.AccountId, C.Phone, C.Fax, C.OwnerId, C.LastModifiedDate, C.LinkedIn_Profile__c, C.Category__c, C.Supplier__c, Salutation, C.Email, C.Title, C.MobilePhone, C.MailingAddress, C.AccountWebsite__c, C.Description, C.MailingCountry, C.Inactive_Contact__c, C.CurrencyIsoCode, C.Opted_In__c, C.VCLS_Main_Contact__c, C.Unsubscribed_from_Marketing_Comms__c, C.VCLS_Initial_Contact__c FROM Contact as C WHERE C.AccountId In ( SELECT A.Id FROM Account as A WHERE (A.Supplier__c = True Or A.Is_supplier__c = True) or (A.Project_Controller__c != Null And A.VCLS_Alt_Name__c != null) )

SELECT O.Id, O.Name, O.AccountId, O.StageName, O.Therapeutic_Area__c, O.OwnerId, O.LastModifiedDate, O.ExpectedRevenue, O.Reasons_Lost_Comments__c, O.Probability, O.CloseDate, O.Deadline_for_Sending_Proposal__c, O.LeadSource, O.Description, O.Client_Product_Description__c, O.CurrencyIsoCode, O.Product_Category__c, O.Amount, O.Geographic_Area__c, O.VCLS_Activities__c,Project_start_date__c FROM Opportunity as O WHERE O.AccountId In ( SELECT A.Id FROM Account as A WHERE (A.Supplier__c = True Or A.Is_supplier__c = True) or (A.Project_Controller__c != Null And A.VCLS_Alt_Name__c != null) )

SELECT Id, Name, OwnerId, Activity__c, Address, City, Company, Content_Name__c, Country,PostalCode, Street, CurrencyIsoCode, Email,First_VCLS_Contact_Point__c, External_Referee__c, Fax, Functional_Focus__c, Inactive_Lead__c, Industry, Contact_us_Message__c, Initial_Product_Interest__c, LastModifiedDate, Title, Seniority__c, Phone, Website, Description, LeadSource FROM Lead

SELECT Id, LastModifiedDate, Name, External_Contract_Name__c, AccountId, CompanySignedDate, CompanySignedId, ContractNumber, ContractTerm, Contract_End_Date__c, Contract_Update__c, Contract_URL__c, CurrencyIsoCode, CustomerSignedDate, CustomerSignedId, CustomerSignedTitle, EndDate,Link_to_Parent_Contract__c, OwnerId, Parent_Contract_Name__c, Parent_Contract_Type__c, Replaces_Supersedes__c, Type_of_Contract__c, VCLS_Status__c FROM Contract
